posts.title: U.S., Taiwan to start formal trade talks under new initiative - Reuters
posts.description: The United States and Taiwan on Wednesday agreed to start trade talks under a new initiative, saying they wanted to reach agreements with "economically meaningful outcomes", in another sign of stepped up U.S. support for the island.

posts.title: How Liz Cheney lost Wyoming's lone seat in the House - CNN
posts.description: Rep. Liz Cheney's supporters say her reelection hopes were doomed on January 13, 2021, when a week after the insurrection at the Capitol, she and nine other House Republicans voted to impeach former President Donald Trump.

posts.title: Rangers part ways with team president Jon Daniels - The Dallas Morning News
posts.description: ARLINGTON — It is Chris Young’s team now. Well, at least as long as Ray Davis says it is. On Wednesday, Davis, the media-shy primary Rangers owner, announced...
